titleStmt.title: A true copy of a letter, sent from the Lord of Inchiquine to the honorable Collonell Michaell Iones, commander in chiefe of the Parliaments forces in Leinster and governor of the citty of Dublin, vvith Colonell Iones his answer, to the Lord of Inchiquines saied letter.
titleStmt.author: Inchiquin, Murrough O'Brien, Earl of, 1614-1674.
Jones, Michael, d. 1649.

notesStmt.note: Identified as Wing O460A, reel 2536, of the UMI microfilm set "Early English books 1641-1700".
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
